title: Date Parsing
description: This stage converts dates from any arbitrary input format into Solr's date format

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

requireTimezone.title: Require Timezone
requireTimezone.description: Accept only formats that explicitly specify the timezone

ignoreInvalid.title: Ignore Invalid
ignoreInvalid.description: When false invalid date strings will cause the whole document to be rejected. When true invalid values are silently discarded

splitLocal.title: Split Local Date Into Parts
splitLocal.description: Split local date (in the local timezone) into parts and store in <part>.local.<sourceField> fields

splitUTC.title: Split UTC Date Into Parts
splitUTC.description: Split UTC date (in the UTC timezone) into parts and store in <part>.utc.<sourceField> fields

dateFormats.title: Date Formats
dateFormats.description: Custom date formats, or empty for default formats

defaultTimezone.title: Default Timezone
defaultTimezone.description: Timezone to assume if one is not present in the incoming date

defaultLocale.title: Default Locale
defaultLocale.description: Locale to assume if different from Locale.ENGLISH. This uses IETF BCP 47 codes.
